SA15bsa020_u:vs_2_0: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇam /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_2_1: yasya pramāṇaṃ na bhavetpramāṇaṃ kastasya kuryādvacanaṃ pramāṇam //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_10_0: viśvāmitraṃ ca caṇḍālī vasiṣṭhaṃ caiva urvaśī /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_10_1: na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇī mātā lokācārācca brāhmaṇāḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_11_0: sadyaḥ patati māṃsena lākṣayā lavaṇena ca /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_12_1: viprāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tato māṃsāni varjayet //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_13_0: brāhmaṇatvaṃ na śāstreṇa na saṃskārairna jātibhiḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_13_1: na kulena na vedena na karmaṇā bhavettataḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_15_0: satyaṃ brahma tapo brahma brahma cendriyanigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_15_1: sarvabhūte dayā brahma etad brāhmaṇa lakṣaṇam //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_16_0: satyaṃ nāsti tapo nāsti nāsti cendriyanigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_17_1: maithunaṃ nādhigacchanti te viprāste ca brāhmaṇāḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_18_1: caṇḍālo 'pi hi tatrasthastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_29_0: na ca te brāhmaṇīputrāste ca lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_30_0: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ na kulaṃ pradhānaṃ kulena kiṃ śīlavivarjitena /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_30_1: bahavo narā nīcakula prasūtāḥ svargaṃ gatāḥ śīlamupetya dhīrāḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_31_1: urubhyāṃ vaiśyaḥ saṃjātaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdraka eva ca //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_32_0: pāṇḍostu viśrutaḥ putraḥ sa vai nāmnā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_33_0: ke ca te brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_33_1: etadicchāmi bho jñātuṃ tad bhavān vyākaroti me //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_35_0: yadā sarvaṃ paradravyaṃ pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_37_1: maithunaṃ hi sadā tyaktaṃ caturthaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_38_1: sarvabhūta dayā śaucaṃ tapaḥ śaucañca pañcamam //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_39_1: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāṃ śeṣāḥ śūdrā yudhiṣṭhira //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_40_0: na kulena na jātyā vā kriyābhirbrāhmaṇo bhavet /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_40_1: caṇḍālo 'pi hi vṛtastho brāhmaṇaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_40a_1: phalena na samarthaṃ ca brāhmaṇaḥ syādyudhiṣṭhira //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_42_0: sarve vai yonijā martyāḥ sarve mūtrapurīṣiṇaḥ /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_45_1: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthe parārthe yasya jīvitam /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_45_2: ahorātraṃ caretkṣāntiṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_48_0: kṣamā dayā damo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ smṛtirghṛṇā /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_51_1: muktaścarati yo dharmaṃ tameva brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_52_0: yadā na kurute pāpaṃ sarvabhūteṣu dāruṇam /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_52_1: kāyena manasā vācā brahma sampadyate tadā //
SA15bsa020_u:vs_53_0: asmābhiruktaṃ yadidaṃ dvijānāṃ mohaṃ nihantuṃ hatabuddhiṃkānām /
SA15bsa020_u:vs_53_1: gṛhmantu santo yadi yuktametanmuñcantvathāyuktamidaṃ yadi syāt //
